item.title: Visual Debugging on VS Code Using GDB
item.description: If you’re already developing a C/C++ project in VS Code, configuring the built-in debugger will allow you to fully use features already within the IDE with only a single configuration file. To those are used to debugging in IDEs like IntelliJ or Visual Studio, this is a much more familiar and pleasant experience. Additionally, this can be done both locally and over SSH via the Remote - SSH extension. For Computer Science & Engineering courses at the UW, I typically open the folder containing my entire repo in VS Code (i.
